Function.Name: npcStop
Function.Description: Stops any anything the NPC is doing, including things it decided to do by itself

Function.Name: ang
Function.Description: Makes an angle

Function.Name: random
Function.Description: Returns a random floating-point number between 0 and the specified value [0 <= x < a ]

Function.Name: matrix4
Function.Description: Creates a 4x4 zero matrix

Function.Name: stoptimer
Function.Description: Stops a timer, can stop interval with stoptimer("interval")

Function.Name: e
Function.Description: Returns Euler's Constant

Function.Name: cosh
Function.Description: Calculates the hyperbolic cosine of C

Function.Name: isOnFire
Function.Description: Is the entity on fire?

Function.Name: ceil
Function.Description: Rounds PYR up to the nearest integer

Function.Name: massCenterL
Function.Description: Returns Bs Center of Mass in local coordinates

Function.Name: getConstraints
Function.Description: Returns an array with all entities directly or indirectly constrained to E, except E itself.

Function.Name: vec
Function.Description: Converts Q to a vector by dropping the real component

Function.Name: teamColor
Function.Description: Returns the color of the team associated with the team number

Function.Name: matrix2
Function.Description: Creates a matrix with values in order (i.j) of: (1,1), (1,2), (2,1), (2,2)

Function.Name: owner
Function.Description: Gets the owner of an entity

Function.Name: toString
Function.Description: Gets the angle nicely formatted as a string "[P,Y,R]"

Function.Name: row
Function.Description: Returns the row as a vector

Function.Name: setDiagonal
Function.Description: Sets the elements of the leading diagonal from the components of a vector

Function.Name: keyAttack2
Function.Description: Is the player pressing their secondary fire key?

Function.Name: toString
Function.Description: The same as toString(C).

Function.Name: gSetGroup
Function.Description: Sets the group that all global write, read, and delete functions will use, default is "default"

Function.Name: floor
Function.Description: Rounds XYZ down to argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: glonDecode
Function.Description: Decodes S into an array, using GLON.

Function.Name: ping
Function.Description: Returns the latency for player E

Function.Name: holoCreate
Function.Description: Index, Position, Scale, Angle, Color (RGB)\nCreates a new hologram entity

Function.Name: isWorld
Function.Description: Is the entity the world?

Function.Name: adj
Function.Description: Returns the adjugate of a matrix (Does not work for 4x4 matrices)

Function.Name: setYaw
Function.Description: Returns a copy of the angle with Yaw replaced (use as Ang = Ang:setYaw(...))

Function.Name: comp
Function.Description: Converts a real number to complex (returns complex number with real part N and imaginary part 0)

Function.Name: tan
Function.Description: Calculates the tangent of C

Function.Name: holoCreate
Function.Description: Index, Position\nCreates a new hologram entity

Function.Name: npcRelationshipByOwner
Function.Description: Sets the NPC's relationship to all currently existing NPCs owned by player E. Returns number of entities added to relationships.

Function.Name: findIncludePlayerProps
Function.Description: Include entities owned by this player from future finds, and remove others not in the whitelist

Function.Name: isSinglePlayer
Function.Description: Returns 1 if singleplayer, 0 if multiplayer

Function.Name: sign
Function.Description: Returns the sign of argument (-1,0,1) [sign(N) = N / abs(N) ]

Function.Name: parent
Function.Description: Returns the entity E is parented to.

Function.Name: right
Function.Description: Gets the right vector of the angle.

Function.Name: vel
Function.Description: Gets the velocity of the entity

Function.Name: x
Function.Description: Gets the x component of the vector

Function.Name: clip1
Function.Description: Returns the amount of ammo in the primary clip of weapon E, -1 if there is no primary clip

Function.Name: round
Function.Description: Rounds PYR to the nearest integer

Function.Name: cscr
Function.Description: Returns the cosecant of N radians

Function.Name: isPlayer
Function.Description: Is the entity a player?

Function.Name: index
Function.Description: Returns Bs index in the entity it belongs to. Returns -1 if the bone is invalid or an error occured

Function.Name: angVel
Function.Description: Gets the angular velocity of the entity

Function.Name: findIncludeEntities
Function.Description: Include all entities from R in future finds, and remove others not in the whitelist

Function.Name: last
Function.Description: Returns 1 if it is being called on the last execution of the expression gate before it is removed or reset. This execution must be requested with the runOnLast(1) command.

Function.Name: time
Function.Description: Returns numerical time/date info from the server. Possible arguments: "year", "month", "day", "hour", "min", "sec", "wday" (weekday, Sunday is 1), "yday" (day of the year), and "isdst" (daylight saving flag 0/1)

Function.Name: right
Function.Description: Returns vector pointing right for Q

Function.Name: findInBox
Function.Description: Like findInSphere but with a globally aligned box, the arguments are the diagonal corners of the box

Function.Name: clamp
Function.Description: Returns a vector in the same direction as vector 1, with length clamped between argument 2(min) and argument 3(max)

Function.Name: findClearWhiteModelList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the model whitelist

Function.Name: isPlayerHolding
Function.Description: Is the entity being held by a player?

Function.Name: convarnum
Function.Description: Give a console command such as "sbox_godmode" and it returns the set value

Function.Name: angles
Function.Description: Gets the pitch, yaw and roll of the entity

Function.Name: findClipFromClass
Function.Description: Filters the list of entities by removing all entities that are of this class

Function.Name: toNumber
Function.Description: Parses a number from a string. The argument given is the base. I.e. toNumber(16) will parse hex.

Function.Name: passenger
Function.Description: Returns the passenger of the vehicle if there is one, in single seat pods this will return the driver.

Function.Name: velL
Function.Description: Returns Bs velocity in local coordinates

Function.Name: toString
Function.Description: Gets the vector nicely formatted as a string "[X,Y,Z]"

Function.Name: npcShoot
Function.Description: Tells the NPC to shoot their gun

Function.Name: runOnTick
Function.Description: If set to 1, the expression will execute once every game tick. See Admin#Tick and http://whisper.ausgamers.com/wiki/index.php/Tickrate For more information on how often this is run.

Function.Name: distance
Function.Description: Gets the distance between vectors

Function.Name: fileListLoaded
Function.Description: If the list has been loaded and it is called, it will return 1. Any time after that until a new list is loaded it will return 0.

Function.Name: ceil
Function.Description: Rounds XYZ up to the nearest integer

Function.Name: tickClk
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the current execution was caused by "runOnTick"

Function.Name: coth
Function.Description: Returns the hyperbolic cotangent of N

Function.Name: isConstrainedTo
Function.Description: Returns the first entity E was constrained to with the given constraint type (see the types list below)

Function.Name: rangerHull
Function.Description: Inputs: Distance, Hull BoxSize

Function.Name: atan
Function.Description: Calculates the inverse tangent of C

Function.Name: floor
Function.Description: Rounds PYR down to the nearest integer

Function.Name: minquota
Function.Description: The ops left before soft quota is used up

Function.Name: rangerHull
Function.Description: Inputs: Distance, X Skew, Y Skew, Hull BoxSize

Function.Name: vec2
Function.Description: Makes a 2D vector

Function.Name: ang
Function.Description: Changes a vector variable into an angle variable

Function.Name: findClearBlackClassList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the class blacklist

Function.Name: applyTorque
Function.Description: Applies torque according to the given vector, representing the torque axis, magnitude and direction

Function.Name: toLocal
Function.Description: Transforms from a world vector to a vector local to E.

Function.Name: vel
Function.Description: Returns Bs velocity

Function.Name: vec2
Function.Description: Same as vec2(0,0)

Function.Name: setPitch
Function.Description: Returns a copy of the angle with Pitch replaced (use as Ang = Ang:setPitch(...))

Function.Name: ops
Function.Description: Returns how many ops are used every execution on average

Function.Name: rangerFlags
Function.Description: Sets the ranger flags. S can be any combination of I=ignore world, W=hit water, E=hit entities and Z=default to zero.

Function.Name: numPlayers
Function.Description: Returns the number of players currently in the server

Function.Name: vec
Function.Description: Changes an angle variable into a vector variable

Function.Name: maxVec
Function.Description: Returns the vector combining the highest value components of V1 and V2

Function.Name: swapElements
Function.Description: Swaps two elements, specified by indices ( i1, j1, i2, j2 )

Function.Name: signalSendToPlayer
Function.Description: sends signal S to chips owned by the given player, multiple calls for different players do not overwrite each other

Function.Name: angVel
Function.Description: Returns Bs angular velocity

Function.Name: toAngle
Function.Description: Returns angle represented by Q

Function.Name: printColor
Function.Description: Works like chat.AddText(...). Parameters can be any amount and combination of numbers, strings, player entities, color vectors (both 3D and 4D).

Function.Name: entity
Function.Description: Returns the entity B belongs to

Function.Name: findResult
Function.Description: Returns the indexed entity from the previous find event (valid parameters are 1 to the number of entities found)

Function.Name: nobone
Function.Description: Returns an invalid bone

Function.Name: findClipToName
Function.Description: Filters the list of entities by removing all entities that do NOT have this name

Function.Name: fileRemove
Function.Description: Removes a file from the server so you can upload another file.

Function.Name: roll
Function.Description: Gets the roll of the angle

Function.Name: glonDecodeTable
Function.Description: Decodes S into a table, using GLON.

Function.Name: y
Function.Description: Returns the local y direction vector from a 3x3 coordinate reference frame matrix ( same as M:column(2) )

Function.Name: qi
Function.Description: Returns quaternion N*i

Function.Name: signalSend
Function.Description: Sends signal S to scope N. Additional calls to this function with the same signal will overwrite the old call until the signal is issued.

Function.Name: matrix
Function.Description: Returns a 3x3 reference frame matrix as described by the angle A. Multiplying by this matrix will be the same as rotating by the given angle.

Function.Name: matrix4
Function.Description: Creates a 4x4 reference frame matrix from an entity's local direction vectors by columns in the order (x, y, z, pos), with the bottom row (0,0,0,1)

Function.Name: sinh
Function.Description: Calculates the hyperbolic sine of C

Function.Name: length
Function.Description: Returns the length of the string.

Function.Name: toByte
Function.Description: Returns the ASCII code of the Nth character in the string

Function.Name: asin
Function.Description: Calculates the inverse sine of C

Function.Name: toString
Function.Description: Formats Q as a string.

Function.Name: ceil
Function.Description: Rounds XYZ up to argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: setMass
Function.Description: Sets Bs mass (between 0.001 and 50,000)

Function.Name: printDriver
Function.Description: Same as EE:printDriver(S), but can make the text show up in different places. N can be one of the following: _HUD_PRINTCENTER, _HUD_PRINTCONSOLE, _HUD_PRINTNOTIFY, _HUD_PRINTTALK.

Function.Name: findByName
Function.Description: Find all entities with the given name

Function.Name: owner
Function.Description: Gets the owner of the expression ( same as entity():owner() )

Function.Name: isVehicle
Function.Description: Is the entity a vehicle?

Function.Name: k
Function.Description: Returns the k component of the quaternion

Function.Name: vec4
Function.Description: Same as vec4(0,0,0,0)

Function.Name: swapColumns
Function.Description: Swaps the two columns specified

Function.Name: rangerFlags
Function.Description: Returns the ranger flags as a string.

Function.Name: glonEncode
Function.Description: Encodes R into a string, using GLON.

Function.Name: matrix2
Function.Description: Converts a 3x3 matrix into a 2x2 matrix - all (i,3) and (3,j) are omitted

Function.Name: setMass
Function.Description: Sets the mass of the entity (between 0.001 and 50,000)

Function.Name: npcGiveWeapon
Function.Description: Gives the NPC an SMG

Function.Name: log
Function.Description: Returns the logarithm to base Argument 2 of Argument 1

Function.Name: friends
Function.Description: Returns an array of players on the prop protection friends list.

Function.Name: clamp
Function.Description: Clamps angle 1's PYR between argument 2(min) and argument 3(max)

Function.Name: csch
Function.Description: Returns the hyperbolic cosecant of N

Function.Name: up
Function.Description: Gets the up direction of the entity

Function.Name: exit
Function.Description: Stops the execution of any code after it

Function.Name: quat
Function.Description: Converts A to a quaternion

Function.Name: boxCenter
Function.Description: Gets the center of the entity's bounding box, as a local position vector

Function.Name: upper
Function.Description: All characters are made uppercase

Function.Name: qRotation
Function.Description: Construct a quaternion from the rotation vector V. Vector direction is axis of rotation, magnitude is angle in degress (by coder0xff)

Function.Name: npcRelationship
Function.Description: Will set the NPC's relationship to the specified entity to the S input, priority N. Priority is any number between 0 and 999. The relationship string can be either "like" "neutral" "hate" or "fear". Same goes for all other relationship functions.

Function.Name: int
Function.Description: Returns the Integer part of the Argument (same as floor)

Function.Name: forward
Function.Description: Gets the forward vector of the angle.

Function.Name: findAllowEntity
Function.Description: Remove E from the blacklist

Function.Name: aimPos
Function.Description: Returns the point that the entity is looking at

Function.Name: forward
Function.Description: Returns vector pointing forward for Q

Function.Name: findClipToSphere
Function.Description: Filters the list of entities by removing all entities NOT within the specified sphere (center, radius)

Function.Name: findIncludeModel
Function.Description: Include entities with this model (or partial model name) in future finds, and remove others not in the whitelist

Function.Name: printColor
Function.Description: Like printColor(...), except taking an array containing all the parameters.

Function.Name: mass
Function.Description: Gets the mass of the entity

Function.Name: log2
Function.Description: Calculates the logarithm of C to base 2

Function.Name: convertUnit
Function.Description: Converts between two units

Function.Name: fileLoad
Function.Description: Loads the file from the client and sends it to server (You must wait at least 10 seconds before uploading to server and the file has to be under 100 kb).

Function.Name: findExcludePlayerProps
Function.Description: Exclude entities owned by this player from future finds

Function.Name: deaths
Function.Description: Returns the number of times the player died

Function.Name: toWorld
Function.Description: Transforms from a vector local to E to a world vector.

Function.Name: printTable
Function.Description: Prints an array like the lua function G.PrintTable|PrintTable does, except to the chat area.

Function.Name: sub
Function.Description: Returns a substring, starting at the number argument and ending at the end of the string

Function.Name: model
Function.Description: Gets the model of an entity

Function.Name: pitch
Function.Description: Gets the pitch of the angle

Function.Name: npcGoRun
Function.Description: Tells the NPC to run to position V

Function.Name: mix
Function.Description: Combines vector 1's XYZ with vector 2's XYZ by a proportion given by argument 3 (between 0 and 1)

Function.Name: setX
Function.Description: Returns a copy of the vector with X replaced (use as Vec = Vec:setX(...))

Function.Name: inNoclip
Function.Description: Is the player in noclip mode?

Function.Name: exp
Function.Description: Returns e to the power of the Argument (same as e()^N but shorter and faster this way)

Function.Name: clip2
Function.Description: Returns the amount of ammo in the secondary clip of weapon E, -1 if there is no secondary clip 1)

Function.Name: selfDestruct
Function.Description: Removes the expression

Function.Name: abs
Function.Description: Returns the Magnitude of the Argument

Function.Name: inVehicle
Function.Description: Is the player in a vehicle?

Function.Name: rangerOffset
Function.Description: You input two vector points, it returns ranger data

Function.Name: replace
Function.Description: Finds and replaces every occurrence of the first argument with the second argument

Function.Name: aimEntity
Function.Description: Returns the entity that the entity is aiming at

Function.Name: rangerIgnoreWorld
Function.Description: Default is 0, if any other value is given it will ignore world

Function.Name: index
Function.Description: Returns Nth letter of the string, formatted as a string.

Function.Name: x
Function.Description: Returns the local x direction vector from a 3x3 coordinate reference frame matrix ( same as M:column(1) )

Function.Name: findToArray
Function.Description: Formats the query as an array, R[Index,entity] to get an entity.

Function.Name: rotate
Function.Description: Gets the rotated vector

Function.Name: frac
Function.Description: Returns the Fractional part of the Argument (same as floor)

Function.Name: playerDamage
Function.Description: Returns 1 if player vs player damage is enabled on the server

Function.Name: quat
Function.Description: Converts a vector to a quaternion (returns V.x*i + V.y*j + V.z*k)

Function.Name: setTrails
Function.Description: StartSize, EndSize, Length, Material, Color (RGB), Alpha, AttachmentID, AdditiveAdds a trail to E with the specified attributes.

Function.Name: random
Function.Description: Returns a random floating-point number between the specified interval [a <= x < b ]

Function.Name: hostname
Function.Description: Returns the Name of the server

Function.Name: lastSaid
Function.Description: Returns what the player E last said.

Function.Name: fileClk
Function.Description: Returns whether the execution was run because a file finished uploading and was that file of a specific file name.

Function.Name: id
Function.Description: Gets the numeric id of an entity

Function.Name: sech
Function.Description: Calculates the hyperbolic secant of C

Function.Name: isWeapon
Function.Description: Is the entity a weapon?

Function.Name: rgb2hsv
Function.Description: Converts V from the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RGB_color_space RGB color space] to the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HSV_color_space HSV color space]

Function.Name: perf
Function.Description: If used as a while loop condition, stabilizes the expression around hardquota used.

Function.Name: toLocalAxis
Function.Description: Transforms a world axis to an axis local to E.

Function.Name: cot
Function.Description: Calculates the cotangent of C

Function.Name: findCanQuery
Function.Description: Returns 1 if find functions can be used, 0 otherwise.

Function.Name: findByClass
Function.Description: Find all entities with the given class

Function.Name: matrix
Function.Description: Converts Q to a transformation matrix

Function.Name: fileLoadList
Function.Description: Loads a list of the file names contained in the client's data/e2files folder.

Function.Name: rotationVector
Function.Description: Returns the rotation vector - rotation axis where magnitude is the angle of rotation in degress (by coder0xff)

Function.Name: findIncludePlayerProps
Function.Description: Include entities owned by this player from future finds, and remove others not in the whitelist

Function.Name: clk
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the current execution was caused by the inserted name

Function.Name: toWorld
Function.Description: Transforms V from local coordinates (as seen from B) to world coordinates

Function.Name: keyAttack1
Function.Description: Is the player pressing their primary fire key?

Function.Name: chatClk
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the chip is being executed because of a chat event. Returns 0 otherwise.

Function.Name: fileListTable
Function.Description: Returns a table of file names that have been loaded. (Tbl["filename"] = "filename")

Function.Name: steamID
Function.Description: Gets the steam ID of the player

Function.Name: rgb2digi
Function.Description: Converts an RGB vector V to a number in digital screen format. N Specifies a mode, either 0, 2 or 3, corresponding to Digital Screen color modes.

Function.Name: matrix2
Function.Description: Creates a 2x2 zero matrix

Function.Name: acos
Function.Description: Calculates the inverse cosine of C

Function.Name: coth
Function.Description: Calculates the hyperbolic cotangent of C

Function.Name: isFrozen
Function.Description: Returns 1 if B is frozen, 0 otherwise

Function.Name: left
Function.Description: Returns N amount of characters starting from the leftmost character

Function.Name: floor
Function.Description: Rounds XYZ down to the nearest integer

Function.Name: lastSaidTeam
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the last message was sent in the team chat, 0 otherwise.

Function.Name: timer
Function.Description: Sets a one-time timer with entered name and delay in milliseconds

Function.Name: round
Function.Description: Rounds XYZ to the nearest integer

Function.Name: sec
Function.Description: Returns the secant of N degrees

Function.Name: lower
Function.Description: All characters are made lowercase

Function.Name: driver
Function.Description: Returns the driver of the vehicle if there is one, nil otherwise

Function.Name: explode
Function.Description: Splits the string into an array, along the boundaries formed by the string S. See also String.Explode

Function.Name: hintDriver
Function.Description: Displays a hint popup to the driver of vehicle E, with message S for N seconds (N being clamped between 0.7 and 7). Same return value as printDriver.

Function.Name: holoScale
Function.Description: Index\nReturns the scale of the given hologram

Function.Name: sqrt
Function.Description: Returns the Square Root of the Argument

Function.Name: ang
Function.Description: Same as ang(0,0,0)

Function.Name: quat
Function.Description: Creates a quaternion with real and "i" parts equal to C

Function.Name: parentBone
Function.Description: Returns the bone E is parented to.

Function.Name: fileClk
Function.Description: Returns whether the execution was run because a file finished uploading.

Function.Name: setDiagonal
Function.Description: Sets the elements of the leading diagonal

Function.Name: y
Function.Description: Gets the y component of the vector

Function.Name: round
Function.Description: Rounds XYZ to argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: setRow
Function.Description: Sets the values of a row. The first argument given specifies the row, the vector contains the values to set

Function.Name: hasConstraints
Function.Description: Returns the number of the constraints E has with the given constraint type (see the types list below)

Function.Name: max
Function.Description: Returns the vector with the greatest length

Function.Name: rangerFilter
Function.Description: Feed an array of entities you don't want the trace to hit

Function.Name: round
Function.Description: Rounds Argument 1 to Argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: signalClearOnRemove
Function.Description: Clears the signal that the chip sends when it is removed from the world.

Function.Name: getColor
Function.Description: Returns the color of an entity as a vector (R,G,B)

Function.Name: hasInput
Function.Description: Returns true if the linked component has an input of the specified name.

Function.Name: max
Function.Description: Returns the highest value Argument

Function.Name: reset
Function.Description: Reset the expression itself as if it was just spawned, stops execution

Function.Name: findExcludeEntity
Function.Description: Exclude E from future finds

Function.Name: fileWrite
Function.Description: Writes a file to your data folder (automatically uploads to server). First argument is the file name, second argument is the data to be written.

Function.Name: signalSetGroup
Function.Description: Sets the E-2's current signal group to S, this is applied during runOnSignal, signalSend, and signalSetOnRemove calls, so call it first.

Function.Name: cot
Function.Description: Returns the cotangent of N degrees

Function.Name: signalSenderId
Function.Description: Returns the entity ID of the chip that sent the signal. Useful if the entity doesn't exist anymore.

Function.Name: hsv2rgb
Function.Description: Converts V from the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HSV_color_space HSV color space] to the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RGB_color_space RGB color space]

Function.Name: xyz
Function.Description: Retrieves the X/Y/Z as the corresponding values in the vector.

Function.Name: isHiSpeed
Function.Description: Returns true if the linked component is high-speed capable.

Function.Name: findClearWhiteEntityList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the player whitelist

Function.Name: i
Function.Description: Returns the imaginary unit i

Function.Name: isSteamFriend
Function.Description: Returns if the given Entity is a steam friend of the first Entity

Function.Name: floor
Function.Description: Rounds PYR down to argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: setSkin
Function.Description: Sets Es skin number.

Function.Name: ln
Function.Description: Returns the logarithm to base e of the Argument

Function.Name: find
Function.Description: Equivalent to findResult(1)

Function.Name: boxMax
Function.Description: Gets the maximum local XYZ of the entity's bounding box (the "highest" corner), as a local position vector

Function.Name: transpose
Function.Description: Returns the transpose of a matrix

Function.Name: vec
Function.Description: Same as vec(0,0,0)

Function.Name: setXyz
Function.Description: Sets the X/Y/Z to the corresponding values in the vector.

Function.Name: runOnLast
Function.Description: If != 0, the chip will run once when it is removed, setting the last() flag when it does.

Function.Name: applyOffsetForce
Function.Description: Applies force to the entity according to the first vector from the location of the second

Function.Name: isFrozen
Function.Description: Is the entity frozen?

Function.Name: toWorldAxis
Function.Description: Transforms an axis local to E to a global axis.

Function.Name: setColumn
Function.Description: Sets the values of a column. The first argument given specifies the column, the vector contains the values to set

Function.Name: findIncludeClass
Function.Description: Include entities with this class (or partial class name) in future finds, and remove others not in the whitelist

Function.Name: ejectPod
Function.Description: Ejects player in vehicle

Function.Name: tanh
Function.Description: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of N

Function.Name: entity
Function.Description: Returns the entity of the linked component.

Function.Name: sub
Function.Description: Returns a substring, starting at the first number argument and ending at the second

Function.Name: angles
Function.Description: Returns Bs pitch, yaw and roll angles

Function.Name: right
Function.Description: Returns a vector describing Bs right direction

Function.Name: mod
Function.Description: Returns the remainder after the components of vector 1 have been divided by the components of vector 2

Function.Name: clamp
Function.Description: Clamps vector 1's XYZ between the XYZ of vector 2(min) and vector 3(max)

Function.Name: height
Function.Description: Gets the height of a player or npc

Function.Name: angnorm
Function.Description: Gets the normalized angle of a number

Function.Name: map
Function.Description: Returns the current map name

Function.Name: findAllowClass
Function.Description: Remove entities with this class (or partial class name) from the blacklist

Function.Name: signalSetOnRemove
Function.Description: Sets the signal that the chip sends when it is removed from the world.

Function.Name: hasConstraints
Function.Description: Returns the number of the constraints E has

Function.Name: random
Function.Description: Returns a random floating-point number between 0 and 1 [0 <= x < 1 ]

Function.Name: format
Function.Description: Formats a values exactly like Lua's [http://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-string.format string.format]. Any number and type of parameter can be passed through the "...". Prints errors to the chat area.

Function.Name: forward
Function.Description: Returns a vector describing Bs forward direction

Function.Name: log
Function.Description: Calculates the logarithm of C to a real base N

Function.Name: rangerPersist
Function.Description: Passing 0 (the default) resets all ranger flags and filters every execution and after calling ranger/rangerOffset. Passing anything else will make the flags and filters persist until they're changed again.

Function.Name: det
Function.Description: Returns the determinant of a matrix (Does not work for 4x4 matrices)

Function.Name: ceil
Function.Description: Rounds Argument 1 up to Argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: findClipToClass
Function.Description: Filters the list of entities by removing all entities that are NOT of this class

Function.Name: steamFriends
Function.Description: Returns a Array with E's steam friends on the server E is playing on

Function.Name: findExcludePlayer
Function.Description: Exclude this player from future finds (put it on the entity blacklist)

Function.Name: rangerAngle
Function.Description: You input the distance, x-angle and y-angle (both in degrees) it returns ranger data

Function.Name: z
Function.Description: Returns the local z direction vector from a 3x3 coordinate reference frame matrix ( same as M:column(3) )

Function.Name: gDeleteAll
Function.Description: Deletes all of the global values stored under the current group, including the ones stored by gSet(S)

Function.Name: isUnderWater
Function.Description: Is the entity under water?

Function.Name: findRE
Function.Description: Returns the 1st occurrence of the string S starting at N and going to the end of the string using REGEX functions, returns 0 if not found

Function.Name: matrix
Function.Description: Creates a reference frame matrix from an entity's local direction vectors by columns in the order ( x, y, z )

Function.Name: matrix4
Function.Description: Returns a 4x4 reference frame matrix as described by the angle A. Multiplying by this matrix will be the same as rotating by the given angle.

Function.Name: bone
Function.Description: Returns Es Nth bone

Function.Name: findClearBlackList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the entire blacklist

Function.Name: isCrouch
Function.Description: Is the player crouching?

Function.Name: j
Function.Description: Returns the j component of the quaternion

Function.Name: dupefinished
Function.Description: Returns 1 when the contraption has finished duping. (Only triggers on Adv Duplicator, not the normal duplicator)

Function.Name: applyForce
Function.Description: Applies force according to the vector given (Forces independently on each axis unlike a vector thruster)

Function.Name: findDisallowModel
Function.Description: Remove entities with this model (or partial model name) from the whitelist

Function.Name: getSkin
Function.Description: Gets Es current skin number.

Function.Name: findPlayerUpdateRate
Function.Description: Returns the minimum delay between entity find events per player

Function.Name: quat
Function.Description: Creates a zero quaternion

Function.Name: velL
Function.Description: Gets the local velocity of the entity

Function.Name: eyeAngles
Function.Description: Gets a players view direction

Function.Name: hideChat
Function.Description: If N != 0, hide the chat message that is currently being processed.

Function.Name: sinr
Function.Description: Returns the sine of N radians

Function.Name: normalized
Function.Description: Gets the normalized vector

Function.Name: positive
Function.Description: Returns a vector containing the positive value of each vector component, equivalent to abs(N)

Function.Name: trimLeft
Function.Description: Trims away opening spaces on the string

Function.Name: reverse
Function.Description: Returns a reversed version of S

Function.Name: findExcludeModel
Function.Description: Exclude entities with this model (or partial model name) from future finds

Function.Name: eye
Function.Description: Gets a players view direction else entity forward direction

Function.Name: getAlpha
Function.Description: Returns the alpha of an entity

Function.Name: fileLoaded
Function.Description: Returns whether or not the file has been loaded onto the server.

Function.Name: isConstrainedTo
Function.Description: Returns the Nth entity E was constrained to with the given constraint type (see the types list below)

Function.Name: shiftR
Function.Description: Shifts the angle's components right: shiftR( p,y,r ) = ( r,p,y )

Function.Name: armor
Function.Description: Gets the armor of the player

Function.Name: log
Function.Description: Calculates the natural logarithm of C

Function.Name: right
Function.Description: Gets the right direction of the entity

Function.Name: replaceRE
Function.Description: Finds and replaces every occurrence of the first argument using REGEX with the second argument

Function.Name: aimBone
Function.Description: Returns the bone the player is currently aiming at

Function.Name: findDisallowPlayer
Function.Description: Remove this player from the entity whitelist

Function.Name: toChar
Function.Description: Returns a one-character string from its [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ASCII ASCII code], where 32 argument 1 255. An empty string is returned for numbers outside that range.

Function.Name: name
Function.Description: Gets the name of a player

Function.Name: signalName
Function.Description: Returns the name of the received signal.

Function.Name: rangerHitWater
Function.Description: Default is 0, if any other value is given it will hit water

Function.Name: toString
Function.Description: Formats a number as a string, using argument 2 as the base. i.e. using 16 for base would convert the number to hex.

Function.Name: isOnGround
Function.Description: Is the player/NPC resting on something?

Function.Name: isLan
Function.Description: Returns 1 if lan mode is enabled

Function.Name: pos
Function.Description: Returns Bs position

Function.Name: length
Function.Description: Gets the length of the vector

Function.Name: sech
Function.Description: Returns the hyperbolic secant of N

Function.Name: findUpdateRate
Function.Description: Returns the minimum delay between entity find events on a chip

Function.Name: fileList
Function.Description: Returns an array of file names that have been loaded.

Function.Name: toAngle
Function.Description: Gets the angles of the vector

Function.Name: tanr
Function.Description: Returns the tangent of N radians

Function.Name: lastSaid
Function.Description: Returns the last message in the chat log.

Function.Name: isAdmin
Function.Description: Is the player an admin?

Function.Name: getColor4
Function.Description: Returns the color of an entity as a 4D vector (R,G,B,A)

Function.Name: conj
Function.Description: Returns the conjugate of C

Function.Name: findClipFromName
Function.Description: Filters the list of entities by removing all entities that do have this name

Function.Name: conj
Function.Description: Returns the conjugate of Q

Function.Name: toByte
Function.Description: Returns the ASCII code of the 1st character in the string

Function.Name: massCenter
Function.Description: Returns Bs Center of Mass

Function.Name: asin
Function.Description: Returns the inverse sine of the argument, in degrees

Function.Name: yaw
Function.Description: Gets the yaw of the angle

Function.Name: findDisallowPlayerProps
Function.Description: Remove entities owned by this player from the whitelist

Function.Name: i
Function.Description: Returns the i component of the quaternion

Function.Name: isAlive
Function.Description: Is the player or NPC alive?

Function.Name: isWeldedTo
Function.Description: Returns the Nth entity E was welded to

Function.Name: minVec
Function.Description: Returns a vector combining the lowest value components of V1 and V2

Function.Name: acos
Function.Description: Returns the inverse cosine of the argument, in degrees

Function.Name: vec4
Function.Description: Makes a 4D vector

Function.Name: findIncludeEntity
Function.Description: Include E in future finds, and remove others not in the whitelist

Function.Name: length2
Function.Description: Gets the squared length of the vector

Function.Name: getMaterial
Function.Description: Returns the material of an entity

Function.Name: asinr
Function.Description: Returns the inverse sine of the argument, in radians

Function.Name: clamp
Function.Description: If Arg1 = Arg3 (max) returns Arg3; otherwise returns Arg1.

Function.Name: rangerHull
Function.Description: Input: Distance, Hull MinSize, Hull MaxSize

Function.Name: outputs
Function.Description: Returns an array of all the outputs that XWL has without their types. Returns an empty array if it has none

Function.Name: runOnFile
Function.Description: Makes the expression execute when the file has finished uploading to the server.

Function.Name: boneCount
Function.Description: Returns Es number of bones

Function.Name: sqrt
Function.Description: Calculates the square root of C

Function.Name: printDriver
Function.Description: Posts a string to the chat of Es driver. Returns 1 if the text was printed, 0 if not.

Function.Name: npcAttack
Function.Description: Tells the NPC to use their melee attack.

Function.Name: holoEntity
Function.Description: Returns the entity corresponding to the hologram given by the specified index.

Function.Name: rangerOffsetHull
Function.Description: Inputs: Distance, StartPos, Direction, Hull BoxSize

Function.Name: min
Function.Description: Returns the lowest value Argument

Function.Name: rangerHull
Function.Description: Inputs: Distance, X Skew, Y Skew, Hull MinSize, Hull MaxSize

Function.Name: pos
Function.Description: Gets the position of the entity

Function.Name: maxquota
Function.Description: The ops left before hard quota is exceeded and the expression shuts down

Function.Name: findPlayerByName
Function.Description: Returns the player with the given name, this is an exception to the rule

Function.Name: mass
Function.Description: Returns Bs mass

Function.Name: bearing
Function.Description: Gets the bearing from the entity to the vector

Function.Name: cosr
Function.Description: Returns the cosine of N radians

Function.Name: abs
Function.Description: Returns the absolute value of C

Function.Name: ceil
Function.Description: Rounds PYR up to argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: quat
Function.Description: Creates a quaternion with real part equal to N

Function.Name: signalGroup
Function.Description: Returns the group name of the received signal.

Function.Name: atanr
Function.Description: Returns the inverse tangent of the arguments (arg1 / arg2), in radians. This function accounts for positive/negative arguments, and arguments at or close to 0

Function.Name: lastSaidTeam
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the last message was sent in the team chat, 0 otherwise.

Function.Name: findClipToModel
Function.Description: Filters the list of entities by removing all entities that do NOT have this model

Function.Name: npcGetTarget
Function.Description: Returns what the npc is currently targeting.

Function.Name: applyForce
Function.Description: Applies force to the entity according to the given vector's direction and magnitude

Function.Name: findDisallowEntity
Function.Description: Remove E from the whitelist

Function.Name: toWorld
Function.Description: Transforms from an angle local to E to a world angle.

Function.Name: abs
Function.Description: Returns absolute value of Q

Function.Name: ranger
Function.Description: Same as above with added inputs for X and Y skew

Function.Name: applyAngForce
Function.Description: Applies torque to B according to A

Function.Name: readString
Function.Description: Reads a null-terminated string from the given address. Returns an empty string on failure.

Function.Name: rangerOffsetHull
Function.Description: Inputs: StartPos, EndPos, Hull MinSize, Hull MaxSize

Function.Name: matrix4
Function.Description: Converts a 3x3 matrix into a 4x4 matrix - all (i,4) and (4,j) are filled with 0's

Function.Name: selfDestructAll
Function.Description: Removes the expression and all constrained props

Function.Name: setZ
Function.Description: Returns a copy of the vector with Z replaced (use as Vec = Vec:setZ(...))

Function.Name: chatClk
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the chip is being executed because of a chat event by player E. Returns 0 otherwise.

Function.Name: gGetGroup
Function.Description: Returns the name of the current group for the chip

Function.Name: qRotation
Function.Description: Returns quaternion for rotation about axis V by angle N

Function.Name: isInWorld
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the position vector is within the world, 0 if not

Function.Name: setElement
Function.Description: Sets an element's value. The first two arguments specify the indices (i,j), the third argument is the value to set it to

Function.Name: shiftL
Function.Description: Shifts the angle's components left: shiftL( p,y,r ) = ( y,r,p )

Function.Name: findRE
Function.Description: Returns the 1st occurrence of the string S using REGEX functions, returns 0 if not found

Function.Name: findIncludePlayer
Function.Description: Include this player in future finds, and remove other entities not in the entity whitelist

Function.Name: randint
Function.Description: Returns a random integer in the specified interval [a <= x <= b ]

Function.Name: inputClk
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the expression was triggered by an input

Function.Name: csc
Function.Description: Calculates the cosecant of C

Function.Name: signalSendDirect
Function.Description: Sends signal S to the given chip. Multiple calls for different chips do not overwrite each other.

Function.Name: elevation
Function.Description: Gets the elevation from the entity to the vector

Function.Name: rangerOffsetHull
Function.Description: Inputs: StartPos, EndPos, Hull BoxSize

Function.Name: min
Function.Description: Returns the vector with the smallest length

Function.Name: cotr
Function.Description: Returns the cotangent of N radians

Function.Name: floor
Function.Description: Rounds the Argument down to the nearest Integer

Function.Name: findAllowPlayerProps
Function.Description: Remove entities owned by this player from the blacklist

Function.Name: toNumber
Function.Description: Parses a number from a string.

Function.Name: npcFace
Function.Description: This will rotate the NPC to face position V. This is purely aesthetic and can't be used to aim their weapon.

Function.Name: acosr
Function.Description: Returns the inverse cosine of the argument, in radians

Function.Name: timeConnected
Function.Description: Returns a players time connected to a server

Function.Name: rotate
Function.Description: Gets the rotated vector

Function.Name: signalGetGroup
Function.Description: Gets the E-2's current signal group

Function.Name: rotateAroundAxis
Function.Description: Returns the angle A rotated around vector V by N degrees.

Function.Name: root
Function.Description: Returns the Nth Root of the first Argument

Function.Name: tanh
Function.Description: Calculates the hyperbolic tangent of C

Function.Name: findAllowModel
Function.Description: Remove entities with this model (or partial model name) from the blacklist

Function.Name: distance2
Function.Description: Gets the squared distance between vectors

Function.Name: qk
Function.Description: Returns N*k

Function.Name: print
Function.Description: Posts S to the chat area.

Function.Name: find
Function.Description: Returns the 1st occurrence of the string S, returns 0 if not found

Function.Name: printTable
Function.Description: Prints a table like the lua function G.PrintTable|PrintTable does, except to the chat area.

Function.Name: right
Function.Description: Returns N amount of characters starting from the rightmost character

Function.Name: vec4
Function.Description: Converts a 3D vector into a 4D vector (the w component is set to 0)

Function.Name: qi
Function.Description: Returns quaternion i

Function.Name: clamp
Function.Description: Clamps angle 1's PYR between the PYR of angle 2(min) and angle 3(max)

Function.Name: toString
Function.Description: Formats a number as a string. (Numbers may be concatenated into a string without using this function)

Function.Name: applyForce
Function.Description: Applies force to B according to Vs direction and magnitude

Function.Name: matrix
Function.Description: Creates a matrix with vectors by columns

Function.Name: inputs
Function.Description: Returns an array of all the inputs that XWL has without their types. Returns an empty array if it has none

Function.Name: findExcludeClass
Function.Description: Exclude entities with this class (or partial class name) from future finds

Function.Name: up
Function.Description: Returns vector pointing up for Q

Function.Name: max
Function.Description: Returns the highest value Argument

Function.Name: i
Function.Description: Returns N*i

Function.Name: secondaryAmmoType
Function.Description: Returns the type of secondary ammo of weapon E as number in a string

Function.Name: findDisallowClass
Function.Description: Remove entities with this class (or partial class name) from the whitelist

Function.Name: trim
Function.Description: Trims away spaces at the beginning and end of a string

Function.Name: gravity
Function.Description: Returns gravity

Function.Name: interval
Function.Description: Causes the expression to execute every N milliseconds (minimum delay is 10 milliseconds)

Function.Name: toString
Function.Description: Formats C as a string.

Function.Name: writeArray
Function.Description: Writes an array's elements into a piece of memory. Strings and sub-tables (angles, vectors, matrices) are written as pointers to the actual data. Strings are written null-terminated.

Function.Name: holoCreate
Function.Description: Index, Position, Scale\nCreates a new hologram entity

Function.Name: findAllowEntities
Function.Description: Remove all entities from R from the blacklist

Function.Name: sin
Function.Description: Calculates the sine of C

Function.Name: pi
Function.Description: Returns the constant PI

Function.Name: rotationAngle
Function.Description: Returns the angle of rotation in degrees (by coder0xff)

Function.Name: mod
Function.Description: Returns the remainder after the components of angle 1 have been divided by the components of angle 2

Function.Name: signalSender
Function.Description: Returns the entity of the chip that sent the signal.

Function.Name: bearing
Function.Description: Returns the bearing (yaw) from B to V

Function.Name: heading
Function.Description: Gets the elevation and bearing from the entity to the vector

Function.Name: findInCone
Function.Description: Like findInSphere but with a http://mathworld.wolfram.com/SphericalCone.html Spherical cone, arguments are for position, direction, length, and degrees (works now)

Function.Name: toDeg
Function.Description: Converts Radian angles to Degree angles

Function.Name: diagonal
Function.Description: Returns a vector comprising the elements along the leading diagonal

Function.Name: rotationAxis
Function.Description: Returns the axis of rotation (by coder0xff)

Function.Name: matrix4
Function.Description: Returns a 4x4 reference frame matrix as described by the angle A and the position V. Multiplying by this matrix will be the same as rotating by the given angle and offsetting by the given vector.

Function.Name: toLocal
Function.Description: Transforms V from world coordinates to local coordinates (as seen from B)

Function.Name: ranger
Function.Description: You input max range, it returns ranger data

Function.Name: fromUnit
Function.Description: Converts specified units to default garrysmod units

Function.Name: elevation
Function.Description: Returns the elevation (pitch) from B to V

Function.Name: identity2
Function.Description: Creates a 2x2 identity matrix

Function.Name: opcounter
Function.Description: Returns how many ops have been used so far in this execution plus the amount of hard quota used

Function.Name: cbrt
Function.Description: Returns the Cube Root of the Argument

Function.Name: ammoCount
Function.Description: Returns the amount of stored ammo of type S on player E, excluding current clip

Function.Name: inertia
Function.Description: Gets the principal components of Bs inertia tensor in the form vec(Ixx, Iyy, Izz)

Function.Name: findExcludePlayer
Function.Description: Exclude this player from future finds (put it on the entity blacklist)

Function.Name: signalClk
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the chip was executed because of any signal, regardless of name, group or scope. Returns 0 otherwise.

Function.Name: hint
Function.Description: Displays a hint popup with message S for N seconds (N being clamped between 0.7 and 7).

Function.Name: angnorm
Function.Description: Gets the normalized angle of an angle

Function.Name: qj
Function.Description: Returns j

Function.Name: findClipFromModel
Function.Description: Filters the list of entities by removing all entities that do have this model

Function.Name: first
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the expression was spawned or reset

Function.Name: rangerFilter
Function.Description: Feed entities you don't want the trace to hit

Function.Name: vec4
Function.Description: Converts a 3D vector into a 4D vector (the w component is set to the second argument)

Function.Name: aimNormal
Function.Description: Returns a normalized directional vector perpendicular to the surface pointed at

Function.Name: writeString
Function.Description: Writes a null-terminated string to the given address. Returns the next free address or 0 on failure.

Function.Name: maxOfType
Function.Description: Returns the maximum allowed of a certain type of entity, i.e. maxOfType("wire_thrusters"). Returns 0 if you enter an invalid parameter.

Function.Name: npcDisp
Function.Description: Returns the NPC's relationship to entity E.

Function.Name: identity4
Function.Description: Creates a 4x4 identity matrix

Function.Name: maxPlayers
Function.Description: Returns the max number of players allowed in the server

Function.Name: tool
Function.Description: returns the name of the tool the player E is currently holding

Function.Name: setY
Function.Description: Returns a copy of the vector with Y replaced (use as Vec = Vec:setY(...))

Function.Name: dot
Function.Description: Gets the vector dot (scalar) product

Function.Name: randint
Function.Description: Returns a random integer from 1 to the specified value [1 <= x <= a ]

Function.Name: real
Function.Description: Returns the real part of C

Function.Name: fileRead
Function.Description: Returns the string data from a given file (has to be loaded onto server).

Function.Name: log
Function.Description: Calculates natural logarithm of Q

Function.Name: vec2
Function.Description: Converts a 3D vector into a 2D vector (the z component is dropped)

Function.Name: rangerHitEntities
Function.Description: Default is 1, if value is given as 0 it will ignore entities

Function.Name: isConstrainedTo
Function.Description: Returns the first entity E was constrained to

Function.Name: toRad
Function.Description: Converts Degree angles to Radian angles

Function.Name: setTrails
Function.Description: StartSize, EndSize, Length, Material, Color (RGB), AlphaAdds a trail to E with the specified attributes.

Function.Name: toUnit
Function.Description: Converts default garrysmod units to specified units

Function.Name: frags
Function.Description: Returns the number of kills the player has made

Function.Name: atan
Function.Description: Returns the inverse tangent of the argument, in degrees

Function.Name: lastSaidWhen
Function.Description: Returns the time the last message was sent.

Function.Name: glonEncode
Function.Description: Encodes T into a string, using GLON.

Function.Name: isConstrainedTo
Function.Description: Returns the Nth entity E was constrained to

Function.Name: vec
Function.Description: Makes a 3D vector

Function.Name: isSuperAdmin
Function.Description: Is the player a super admin?

Function.Name: hasOutput
Function.Description: Returns true if the linked component has an output of the specified name.

Function.Name: holoCreate
Function.Description: Index, Position, Scale, Angle\nCreates a new hologram entity

Function.Name: mod
Function.Description: Returns the remainder after PYR have been divided by argument 2

Function.Name: findClosest
Function.Description: Returns the closest entity to the given point from the previous find event

Function.Name: inputType
Function.Description: Returns the type of input that S is in lowercase. ( "NORMAL" is changed to "number" )

Function.Name: round
Function.Description: Rounds the Argument to the nearest Integer

Function.Name: vehicle
Function.Description: Returns the entity of the vehicle that the specified player is in

Function.Name: realtime
Function.Description: Returns the current real time since server-start in seconds*

Function.Name: log10
Function.Description: Returns the logarithm to base 10 of the Argument

Function.Name: secr
Function.Description: Returns the secant of N radians

Function.Name: toLocal
Function.Description: Transforms from a world angle to an angle local to E.

Function.Name: removeTrails
Function.Description: Removes the trail from E

Function.Name: z
Function.Description: Gets the z component of the vector

Function.Name: forward
Function.Description: Gets the forward direction of the entity 2)

Function.Name: qMod
Function.Description: Changes quaternion Q so that the represented rotation is by an angle between 0 and 180 degrees (by coder0xff)

Function.Name: soundDuration
Function.Description: soundDuration(string Path to File) Returns the duration of the sound. Note: If the server hasn't the file it returns 60

Function.Name: isWeldedTo
Function.Description: Returns the first entity E was welded to

Function.Name: element
Function.Description: Returns the element with indices (i,j)

Function.Name: rangerOffset
Function.Description: You input the range, a position vector, and a direction vector and it returns ranger data

Function.Name: gamemode
Function.Description: Returns the name of the current gamemode

Function.Name: imag
Function.Description: Returns the imaginary part of C

Function.Name: floor
Function.Description: Rounds Argument 1 down to Argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: findClearBlackPlayerPropList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the prop owner blacklist

Function.Name: cosh
Function.Description: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of N

Function.Name: trace
Function.Description: Returns the trace of a matrix

Function.Name: curtime
Function.Description: Returns the current game time since server-start in seconds*

Function.Name: findByModel
Function.Description: Find all entities with the given model

Function.Name: qk
Function.Description: Returns k

Function.Name: holoCanCreate
Function.Description: Returns 1 when holoCreate() will successfully create a new hologram until the Max limit is reached\nReplaces holoRemainingSpawns()

Function.Name: printColorDriver
Function.Description: Like printColor but prints to the driver of a specified vehicle.

Function.Name: swapRows
Function.Description: Swaps the two rows specified

Function.Name: fileAppend
Function.Description: Adds to the end of a file on your client, and if the file is on the server it adds to that file as well. First argument is the file name, second argument is the data to be written.

Function.Name: findDisallowPlayerProps
Function.Description: Remove entities owned by this player from the whitelist

Function.Name: entity
Function.Description: Gets the entity of the expression

Function.Name: up
Function.Description: Gets the up vector of the angle.

Function.Name: signalClk
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the chip was executed because the signal S was sent to the scope N, regardless of group. Returns 0 otherwise.

Function.Name: massCenterL
Function.Description: Gets the center of mass as a local vector

Function.Name: printColorDriver
Function.Description: Like printColorDriver but takes an array containing all the parameters.

Function.Name: holoCreate
Function.Description: Index\nCreates a new hologram entity

Function.Name: sinh
Function.Description: Returns the hyperbolic sine of N

Function.Name: shootPos
Function.Description: Returns a players shoot position

Function.Name: outputType
Function.Description: Returns the type of output that S is in lowercase. ( "NORMAL" is changed to "number" )

Function.Name: shiftL
Function.Description: Shifts the vector's components left: shiftL( x,y,z ) = ( y,z,x )

Function.Name: tan
Function.Description: Returns the tangent of N degrees

Function.Name: lastSaidWhen
Function.Description: Returns when the given player last said something.

Function.Name: csc
Function.Description: Returns the cosecant of N degrees

Function.Name: mod
Function.Description: Returns the remainder after XYZ have been divided by argument 2

Function.Name: team
Function.Description: Returns the team number a player is on

Function.Name: findClearBlackEntityList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the entity blacklist

Function.Name: entity
Function.Description: Gets the entity associated with the id

Function.Name: applyOffsetForce
Function.Description: Applies force to the expression according to the first vector from the location of the second

Function.Name: holoScaleUnits
Function.Description: Index\nReturns the scale of the given hologram

Function.Name: getSkinCount
Function.Description: Gets Es number of skins.

Function.Name: up
Function.Description: Returns a vector describing Bs up direction

Function.Name: fileListClk
Function.Description: Returns whether the execution was run because a list was uploaded to the server.

Function.Name: mix
Function.Description: Combines angle 1's PYR with angle 2's PYR by a proportion given by argument 3 (between 0 and 1)

Function.Name: findClearWhitePlayerPropList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the prop owner whitelist

Function.Name: teamName
Function.Description: Returns the name of the team associated with the team number

Function.Name: ceil
Function.Description: Rounds the Argument up to the nearest Integer

Function.Name: noentity
Function.Description: Returns an invalid entity

Function.Name: shiftR
Function.Description: Shifts the vector's components right: shiftR( x,y,z ) = ( z,x,y )

Function.Name: cos
Function.Description: Returns the cosine of N degrees

Function.Name: killPod
Function.Description: Kills player in vehicle

Function.Name: log2
Function.Description: Returns the logarithm to base 2 of the Argument

Function.Name: type
Function.Description: Gets the class of an entity

Function.Name: min
Function.Description: Returns the lowest value Argument

Function.Name: mRotation
Function.Description: Creates a 3x3 rotation matrix, where the vector is the axis of rotation, and the number is the angle (anti-clockwise) in degrees. Example*: to rotate a vector (7,8,9) by 50 degrees about the axis (1,1,0), you would write V = mRotation(vec(1,1,0), 50) * vec(7,8,9)

Function.Name: isNPC
Function.Description: Is the entity a NPC?

Function.Name: bones
Function.Description: Returns an array containing all of Es bones. This array's first element has the index 0!

Function.Name: isConstrained
Function.Description: Returns 1 if E has constraints, 0 if not

Function.Name: boxMin
Function.Description: Gets the minimum local XYZ of the entity's bounding box (the "lowest" corner), as a local position vector

Function.Name: exp
Function.Description: Raises Euler's constant e to the power Q

Function.Name: max
Function.Description: Returns the highest value Argument

Function.Name: column
Function.Description: Returns the column as a vector

Function.Name: repeat
Function.Description: Repeats the input string N times

Function.Name: radius
Function.Description: Gets the size of the object (not precisely, but useful)

Function.Name: isDedicated
Function.Description: Returns 1 if server is dedicated, 0 if listen

Function.Name: findAllowPlayer
Function.Description: Remove this player from the entity blacklist

Function.Name: comp
Function.Description: Returns complex zero

Function.Name: massCenter
Function.Description: Gets the Center of Mass of the entity

Function.Name: arg
Function.Description: Returns the argument of C

Function.Name: atanr
Function.Description: Returns the inverse tangent of the argument, in radians

Function.Name: keyUse
Function.Description: Is the player pressing their use key?

Function.Name: holoIndex
Function.Description: Returns the index of the given hologram entity.

Function.Name: concmd
Function.Description: Takes a string and executes it in console. Returns 1 if it succeeded and 0 if it failed.The client must enable this in the console with "wire_expression2_concmd 1". "wire_expression2_concmd_whitelist" allows you to choose which commands can be used.[http://www.wiremod.com/forum/151800-post12.html]

Function.Name: exp
Function.Description: Raises Euler's constant e to the power of C

Function.Name: setRow
Function.Description: Sets the values of a row. The first argument given specifies the row(j), the following arguments are the values 1j, 2j, 3j

Function.Name: npcGiveWeapon
Function.Description: Gives the NPC a weapon. Example: E:npcGiveWeapon("pistol"). Other arguments include "ar2", "crowbar", "357", "shotgun", "crossbow", "rpg", "frag", etc. Other such as the bugbait or slam may be buggy.

Function.Name: findClearBlackModelList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the model blacklist

Function.Name: findAllowPlayerProps
Function.Description: Remove entities owned by this player from the blacklist

Function.Name: mod
Function.Description: Modulo, returns the Remainder after Argument 1 has been divided by Argument 2. Note "mod(-1, 3) = -1"

Function.Name: qj
Function.Description: Returns N*j

Function.Name: findSortByDistance
Function.Description: Sorts the entities from the last find event, index 1 is the closest to point V, returns the number of entities in the list

Function.Name: npcRelationship
Function.Description: Same as above, but sets relationship to an entire class specified by the first string. Example: "npc_manhack", "prop_physics".

Function.Name: real
Function.Description: Returns the real component of the quaternion

Function.Name: sin
Function.Description: Returns the sine of N degrees

Function.Name: csqrt
Function.Description: Calculates the complex square root of the real number N

Function.Name: min
Function.Description: Returns the lowest value Argument

Function.Name: find
Function.Description: Returns the 1st occurrence of the string S starting at N and going to the end of the string, returns 0 if not found

Function.Name: findClearWhiteClassList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the class whitelist

Function.Name: runOnChat
Function.Description: If N == 0, the chip will no longer run on chat events, otherwise it makes this chip execute when someone chats. Only needs to be called once, not in every execution.

Function.Name: print
Function.Description: Same as print(S), but can make the text show up in different places. N can be one of the following: _HUD_PRINTCENTER, _HUD_PRINTCONSOLE, _HUD_PRINTNOTIFY, _HUD_PRINTTALK.

Function.Name: volume
Function.Description: Gets the volume of the entity

Function.Name: findExcludePlayerProps
Function.Description: Exclude entities owned by this player from future finds

Function.Name: applyAngForce
Function.Description: Applies torque to the entity according to the given angle

Function.Name: inv
Function.Description: Returns the inverse of Q

Function.Name: weapon
Function.Description: Returns the weapon that player E is currently holding

Function.Name: quat
Function.Description: Converts angle of E to a quaternion

Function.Name: rangerDefaultZero
Function.Description: If given any value other than 0 it will default the distance data to zero when nothing is hit

Function.Name: signalClk
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the chip was executed because the signal S was sent, regardless of group or scope. Returns 0 otherwise.

Function.Name: findDisallowEntities
Function.Description: Remove all entities from R from the whitelist

Function.Name: health
Function.Description: Gets the health of the entity

Function.Name: eyeTrace
Function.Description: Equivalent to rangerOffset(16384, E:shootPos(), E:eye()), but faster (causing less lag)

Function.Name: matrix
Function.Description: Creates a 3x3 zero matrix

Function.Name: findDisallowPlayer
Function.Description: Remove this player from the entity whitelist

Function.Name: lastSpoke
Function.Description: Returns the last player to speak.

Function.Name: setRoll
Function.Description: Returns a copy of the angle with Roll replaced (use as Ang = Ang:setRoll(...))

Function.Name: npcGoWalk
Function.Description: Tells the NPC to walk to position V

Function.Name: findInSphere
Function.Description: Finds entities in a sphere around V with a radius of N, returns the number found after filtering

Function.Name: rangerOffsetHull
Function.Description: Inputs: Distance, StartPos, Direction, Hull MinSize, Hull MaxSize

Function.Name: duped
Function.Description: Returns 1 if the expression was duplicated

Function.Name: cos
Function.Description: Calculates the cosine of C

Function.Name: findClearWhiteList
Function.Description: Clear all entries from the entire whitelist

Function.Name: boxSize
Function.Description: Gets the dimensions of the entity's bounding box as a vector (length, width, height)

Function.Name: rangerReset
Function.Description: Resets all ranger flags and filters.

Function.Name: findIncludePlayer
Function.Description: Include this player in future finds, and remove other entities not in the entity whitelist

Function.Name: inertia
Function.Description: Gets the principal components of the entity's inertia tensor in the form ( Ixx, Iyy, Izz )

Function.Name: round
Function.Description: Rounds PYR to argument 2's decimal precision

Function.Name: csch
Function.Description: Calculates the hyperbolic cosecant of C

Function.Name: dehomogenized
Function.Description: Converts a 2D homogeneous vector (x,y,w) into a 2D cartesian vector

Function.Name: findAllowPlayer
Function.Description: Remove this player from the entity blacklist

Function.Name: findExcludeEntities
Function.Description: Exclude all entities from R from future finds

Function.Name: trimRight
Function.Description: Trims away spaces at the end of a string

Function.Name: identity
Function.Description: Creates a 3x3 identity matrix

Function.Name: removing
Function.Description: Returns 1 if this is the last() execution and caused by the entity being removed.

Function.Name: sec
Function.Description: Calculates the secant of C

Function.Name: findClipFromSphere
Function.Description: Filters the list of entities by removing all entities within the specified sphere (center, radius)

Function.Name: setColumn
Function.Description: Sets the values of a column. The first argument given specifies the column(i), the following arguments are the values i1, i2, i3

Function.Name: convar
Function.Description: Give a console command such as "name" and it returns the set value

Function.Name: randvec
Function.Description: Returns a uniformly distributed, random, normalized direction vector.

Function.Name: runOnList
Function.Description: Makes the expression execute when the list has finished uploading to the server.

Function.Name: angVelVector
Function.Description: Returns rotation axis, velocity and direction given as the vector's direction, magnitude and sense

Function.Name: log10
Function.Description: Calculates the logarithm of C to base 10

Function.Name: primaryAmmoType
Function.Description: Returns the type of primary ammo of weapon E as a number in a string
